attributes.action: Death sentence for acts of terrorism against UK
attributes.additional_details:
The death penalty should be reintroduced for acts of terrorism in the UK or against UK citizens, but only in cases where all 12 members of the jury reach a guilty verdict.

This should be done at the lowest cost to the tax payer, but by a method that as is in keeping with our respectful, placid homeland. The lethal injection would be a suitable option.

Terrorists and terrorist groups should fear attacking our country, and realise that their actions will be punished.
